participant_1.background:
My first day of safety patrol is a little nerve-wracking, but I'm excited to help keep my school safe.
pudding makes me gassy.
I look forward to sharing my opinions with others and starting a new life in Australia.
I drive a Subaru Outback because it is roomy for my quilting supplies and my mountain bike.
I have an interest in fashion and try to wear nice clothes every day.

participant_2.background:
I'm not too concerned with my appearance, because I'm more focused on my studies.
my car has to be as fast as my motorcycle.
my favorite beer is coors.
I remember my mother reading to me every night before bed.
I am a construction worker, and I take pride in my work.

content.text: Hi, how is your day going?
It's going well. I am nervous about my first day of safety patrol at school.
It's a program where students help to keep their school safe.
That sounds like a great idea. I'm sure you will do a great job.
Thanks, I hope so. I am also looking forward to moving to Australia.
Oh, why are you moving there?
I want to start a new life and share my opinions with others.
That's great! I'm sure you will make many new friends there.
Thanks, I hope so. I'm also interested in fashion and try to wear nice clothes every day.
That's good to hear. I'm not too concerned with my appearance because I'm more focused on my studies.
That's good to hear. I'm sure you will do great in your studies.
Thanks, I hope so. I'm also a construction worker and I take pride in my work.
That's great to hear. I'm sure you will make a great contribution to the construction industry.
